dmca.title: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Use of WESTERN UNIONR Marks (Reference no. 2.23.158)
dmca.body:
t

________________________________

From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
BrandProtection@firstdata.com
Posted At: Friday, June 16, 2006 12:24 PM
Posted To: Microsoft Office Outlook Embedded Message
Conversation: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Use of WESTERN UNION(r) Marks
(Reference no. 2.23.158)
Subject: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Use of WESTERN UNION(r) Marks (Reference
no. 2.23.158)



  

WESTERN UNION HOLDINGS, INC. 

6200 So. Quebec Street, 

Greenwood Village, CO. 80111 U.S.A 


06/16/2006
 
VIA E-MAIL at  abuse@theplanet.com
 
Abuse

1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 Dallas TX, 75207

Re: Unauthorized Use of the WESTERN UNION Marks on
http://www.pene-sano.com (Our reference no. 2.23.158) 


To Whom It May Concern: 


This notification and request concern use of the WESTERN UNION service
marks on the website at  http://www.pene-sano.com, for which you are
listed as registrant and/or administrative contact. 


Western Union Holdings, Inc. ("Western Union") owns all intellectual
property rights in the famous WESTERN UNION family of trademarks and
service marks (the "WESTERN UNION Marks"), which include the words
"WESTERN UNION" and/or the initials "WU" standing alone, as well as the
WESTERN UNION ?? design and Western Union?s golden yellow and black
trade dress. The WESTERN UNION Marks, which have been in use in some
instances since 1851, are famous throughout the world in connection with
numerous and varied communication and financial services. Worldwide,
Western Union owns over 720 registrations for WESTERN UNION Marks and
over 150 pending applications for WESTERN UNION Marks. Through Western
Union?s long-standing use and promotion of the WESTERN UNION Marks in
international commerce, the Marks have acquired great value and
goodwill.  

It has been brought to Western Union?s attention that the WESTERN UNION
Marks are being used on the website located at
http://www.pene-sano.com/inscrip.html. Western Union is concerned that
this unauthorized use of the WESTERN UNION Marks will confuse consumers
as to whether Western Union somehow is associated with, or approves of,
http://www.pene-sano.com and/or the activities conducted through
http://www.pene-sano.com. Further, Western Union is concerned that such
authorized use of its Marks may dilute their distinctiveness and Western
Union?s good will.
 
Western Union understands that you may not previously have been aware
that such use of the WESTERN UNION Marks is not authorized and that it
may violate U.S. and international trademark laws. Accordingly, this
letter is formal notification that Western Union cannot permit such
unauthorized use of the WESTERN UNION Marksand a formal request that
such use immediately cease. 

Please ensure that the WESTERN UNION Marks immediately are removed from
the website at  http://www.pene-sano.com; that any print, electronic,
and other forms of promotional materials containing any form of the
WESTERN UNION Marks and/or marks confusingly similar to the WESTERN
UNION Marks (including uses in metatags, keywords or other "ad
triggers," postURL or forwarding commands, hyperlinks, or any other
electronic coding) are withdrawn from publication; and that you refrain
from further use of any form of the WESTERN UNION Marks and/or marks
confusingly similar thereto. We stress that the WESTERN UNION Marks
include the words "WESTERN UNION" and/or the initials "WU" alone, the
WESTERN UNION double-bar logo, and the distinctive WESTERN UNION golden
yellow and black trade dress ? and any marks or names confusingly
similar thereto, including variants, abbreviations, and misspellings of
the words "WESTERN UNION." 
 
We shall look forward  to receiving your written response to our
notification and request. Please do not hesitate to contact us with you
further questions or concerns. 
 
This notification and request do not prejudice Western Union's rights
and remedies related to this matter, which hereby are expressly
reserved.
 
Sincerely,
Western Union Holdings, Inc.- Intellectual Property Group
12500 Belford Ave. M21A2
Englewood, Colorado 80112
Fax # 720-332-0518
 
This email is sent by the General Counsel's Office of First Data
Corporation and may contain information that is privileged and/or
confidential. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the
sender immediately and delete this e-mail and any attachments. Thank you
